scripts.build: npm run build:devscripts -s && npm run build:styles -s && npm run build:cp -s
scripts.dev:bs: browser-sync start --browser='google chrome canary' --server 'assets' --files='app/assets/stylesheets/*.css, assets/*.html, app/assets/javascripts/*.js' --index='index.html'
scripts.dev:css: node-sass --include-path front-end/stylesheets < front-end/stylesheets/application.scss | postcss --use autoprefixer --autoprefixer.browsers '> 1%' -m > app/assets/stylesheets/application.css
scripts.dev:build: npm run dev:css & npm run dev:js
scripts.dev:bsmon: npm run dev:bs & npm run dev:moncss & npm run dev:monjs
scripts.dev:s: npm run dev:build && npm run dev:bsmon
